posts.post_content:
I need a Project ....... :)  

My hours at work have been cut in half (don't worry about me, I'm a rainy-day type of guy), and I'm mainly bored as all get out.

I have bought an sold thousands upon thousands of T206s in my day.  A "hobby" within the "hobby" for me.

If you are looking to sell any size T206 lot, please send me an email.  I'm certain we can work something out that would benefit both parties.


[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]


.............. and for something completely different ........ :p

Anyone happen to have a low grade Hindu Birmingham lying around .... :o .... won't mind finishing off an odd little sub-set ............ ;)

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=390116&d=1584814436[/IMG]


Thanks, Scott

Thumbs up for this member. Excellent buyer/seller/trader.

Good luck Scott!

Well .................. my work was supposed to re-open fully today ..... but ... there seems to be a "spike" down here in good ol' Savannah ........ so it looks like I maybe "bored" for sometime now ..... :(

In other words (:rolleyes:), I'm looking for some new "projects."

The first time I posted this buying request, quite a few of the grand fellow net54'ers came through for me ..... :)

So, once again, looking to buy some lots of T206s to play with.  Any size (50+ would be nice); graded or raw.  Not looking to make anything, but, certainly not looking to lose much either ............

If you have anything you'd like to move, please feel free to email me at:

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott

_______________________________________________

What the heck, while I got a post going, here are some of my wants:

Few remaining common "back upgrades."
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=406526&d=1593029132[/IMG]

These next two lists are cards I'd like with either Sov.150, EPDG, OM, or Hindu (as available):
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=406529&d=1593029149[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=406530&d=1593029153[/IMG]

Oh, and Hindu Ellam, Foster, and Mullaney (and, of course, Tolstoi Cross :p)

Thanks, again, Scott :rolleyes:
You're the best i owe you one

*** BUMP ***

My inventory, for the first time in memory (:rolleyes:) is at ZERO ..... :(

Still not fully re-opened at work, and quite bored.

So, if you happen to have a stack of T206's that you don't wish to deal with, please let me know.  I would love a new "project."

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]


Also, the above wants lists are still "in search of," other than Powers.

Thanks, Scott
